title: Breakfast
text: Waited 40 minutes for breakfast, people who came in after me received their food. When I asked if my order had been lost, it was just a couple minutes before food arrived at table. Everything was cold, eggs, hashbrowns, biscuit & gravy. I could tell it had been sitting a while because gravy had set up with film on it. I watched as orders came out of kitchen being set to the side. I took note of someone‚Äôs order sitting there for 5 minutes, I timed it. I don‚Äôt understand why they do that. Food should be taken to tables immediately. I have tried this place several times and only once was the experience enjoyable. Very disappointing that there is no where else to eat breakfast in Versailles other than fast food. No plans on returning!

title: Scams
text: I got off Facebook do to all the sale scams that they ignored. Amazon had skids for sale for for 10.00 bucks. Reviews were all fake they took my money and nothing. I reported and not a word back and the sale was still on. I called Amazon and they said it was not the company it was a scam!!! Ok then Clark‚Äôs shoes had boots for sale and I love Clark shoes so I tried it again‚Ä¶ I got shoes that were rubber boots and looked nothing like I ordered from Facebook so again I called the company they said it was a scam!!! I reported it to Facebook and nothing. Macy‚Äôs had a advertisement for a people size dog bed another scam and Facebook did nothing again. But they take things I post that are funny and cute and do nothing for  fake company scams. 12 of my friends got off Facebook also do to the lack of concern regarding money they take and do nothing!!!! We think these scams are from Facebook people, no wonder why the ceo is wealthy‚Ä¶. Scams.                     June
